decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
00HH010 rev A (Existing Ground floor plan and First floor plan),
00HH110 rev A (Existing and proposed ground floor plan and proposed 1st floor plan),
00HH120 rev A (Existing and Proposed Rear and side elevation),
00HH020 rev A (Existing Front and rear elevation),
00HH210 rev B (Proposed Ground and First Floor Plan),
00HH220 rev B (Proposed front and rear elevation),
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall complement the appearance of those of the existing property and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - Section 12, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012) and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
| No part of any roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - Section 12, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
| The proposed boundary treatment to be attached to the raised platform hereby granted shall be installed as per the approved drawings prior to first use of the platform and retained in perpetuity.
REASON: To protect the residential amenity of neighbouring properties in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear infill extension (following demolition of existing rear extension) and installation of raised platform
